channel.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/machscape.png[/img]
[size=14pt]A 2006 Remake in Progress[/size][/center]
MachScape is a 2006 RuneScape remake project launched by MachTech, an organization involved in everything tech. We intend to pick up where i am infamy left off and create one of the most accurate 2006 remakes of RuneScape out there. (No restrictions on usage of his server source were mentioned, see here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550196.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550196.0.html[/url])
Currently, there are only two people on the development team and we are looking for new members to help develop the server provided they have the time, will, and dedication. If you wish to apply for one of these positions, please reply using this application format:
Name: Which Spot Are You Applying For?: (Tester/developer.) Experience: Proof of ability: Do you have a Google Chat account?: (If you don't, PM your email.) Are you on Google+?: Country: (If US/other large country with multiple time zones, specify which time zone you live in.) Native Language: (If not English, how fluent are you in English?) Extra info. (opt.):
All team members that join would be paid equally provided there was leftover donation money after a VPS is paid for a month.
[size=18pt][url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lZzDvMP73R6Izkpb7phK4qK7-ZP6z6Rm4tUxGafOg4g/edit]Development Log[/url][/size]
[size=18pt]The Team[/size] Kr3m1in - MoparScape username 'MachTech' Robert1122
[size=18pt]Features & Progress[/size]
Black = Completed. Orange = Started, but not completed. Red = Planned, but not started
[size=16pt]Base[/size] PI/Project 06 Remake
[size=16pt]Combat[/size] PvP complete Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Equipment requirements
[size=16pt]Magic[/size] All modern spells Cannot cast through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes Bones to bananas Bones to Peaches Weakening spells Bind, snare, entangle Teleports, teleothers Alching Superheat Enchanting jewelry
[size=16pt]Prayer[/size] All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[size=16pt]Mining[/size] Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[size=16pt]Firemaking[/size] All logs lightable Adding and depleting of lit logs Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations
[size=16pt]Woodcutting[/size] Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations Most trees cuttable except for regular tree
[size=16pt]Crafting - 40%[/size] Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets Tanning normal and hard leather Crafting normal and hard leather Spinning wool Making pottery
[size=16pt]Cooking[/size] All fish can be cooked All meats can be cooked Grinding wheat into flour Cakes Pies Pizza Stew Wine Correct burning formula Lumbridge cooking range bonus Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used
[size=16pt]Rune Crafting[/size] Multiple rune crafting All alters Pouches Talisman Locating
[size=16pt]Other Skills[/size] Unknown. We're assuming the rest are all complete. When we validate that assumption, we'll update this.
[size=16pt]Quests[/size] Cook's Assistant Desert Treasure Doric's Quest Horror From the Deep Recipe for Disaster All other quests have no progress.
[size=16pt]Tutorial Island[/size] RuneScape Instructor Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor Cooking instructor Quest instructor Mining/Smithing instructor Combat instructor Money instructor Prayer instructor Magic instructor Correct hint arrows Doors
[size=16pt]Credits[/size] Jagex Izumi Sanity Matt I am Infamy [Project 06 Remake Base [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550196.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550196.0.html[/url]]
No restrictions for use were stated on the server page at the time of download.
I am Infamy: For public reassurance purposes, we would like to attain unconditional permission from you to develop it further. If unconditional permission is not possible, please state your conditions of use.
[size=18pt]Media[/size] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18187962/Forum/roll/8.png[/img]
[size=24pt]MORE MEDIA SOON[/size]

item.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]
item.dc:creator: @MachTech MachTech
item.description:
@MachTech wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:16, topic:448854”][quote author=MachTech link=topic=551748.msg4050479#msg4050479 date=1342466875]

Proof of ability: (Rep is more than enough proof, I can also review posts at request.)[/quote]
Rep doesn’t mean anything.

Sure it does - doesn’t it show how much helpful and substantial posts or content you posted/released?

No… Are you kidding me? post funny things, if people like you, hell sometimes people even hit the rep button for nothing, it doesn’t mean a thing.[/quote]

K. I’ll remove that from the original post and take less heed to rep as a measure of somebody’s ability to develop.

Read full topic

item.description:
@MachTech wrote:

[quote=“james4370, post:10, topic:448854”]Name: James
Experience: only like couple weeks im learning
Proof of ability: None atm but im
Do you have a Google Chat account?: no, add my skype if possible?
Are you on Google+?: no
Country: u.s, GMT -5
Native Language: English
Extra info. (opt.): Im a nice guy and i love 2006 remakes im loyal will be on when ever needed will do almost any thing im need to do[/quote]

I just saw your application posted and I just want to tell you that I don’t have Skype - I stay away from Microsoft when it concerns my communications.

If you want, we can simply discuss via MoparScape PM.

item.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]
item.dc:creator: @MachTech MachTech
item.description:
@MachTech wrote:

TheAmmoBandit:

Another remake of google? I wish you goodluck against the other teams.

If you’re saying “Oh gawd, another 314”, I get what you’re saying.

The reason we’re going with a 314 is because it’s simple, classy, and it offers even more choice to people when they decide they want to play on a 314 server. Friendly competition always helps everyone, and it could perhaps lead to collaboration between the other server projects.

Read full topic

item.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]
item.dc:creator: @MachTech MachTech
item.description:
@MachTech wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:448854”]I kinda want to get back into a remake… The reason mine failed was cause 2 of my developers screwed me over

I want to make a suggestion. Don’t work on P2P things for now… What I would do, is get F2P down, and then put it online. As you go along (after it’s online), work on individual P2P cities (quests, areas, objects etc) and release them one by one. Just a suggestion ;3[/quote]

What we’re planning on doing is getting all the skills to work, then we’ll bring it online. After that, we’ll bug fix what we have released, then work on F2P stuff. We’ve got this thing planned behind closed doors pretty well.

But, before we’re going to do any heavy developing, we’re going to attempt to get a team together. If you’re interested, just post the application or PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I kinda want to get back into a remake… The reason mine failed was cause 2 of my developers screwed me over

I want to make a suggestion. Don’t work on P2P things for now… What I would do, is get F2P down, and then put it online. As you go along (after it’s online), work on individual P2P cities (quests, areas, objects etc) and release them one by one. Just a suggestion ;3

Read full topic

item.title: MachScape [TESTERS WANTED] [Programmers Wanted] [314]

item.description:
@MachTech wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]A 2006 Remake in Progress[/size][/center]

MachScape is a 2006 RuneScape remake project launched by MachTech, an organization involved in everything tech. We intend to pick up where i am infamy left off and create one of the most accurate 2006 remakes of RuneScape out there. (No restrictions on usage of his server source were mentioned, see here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550196.0.html)

Currently, there are only two people on the development team and we are looking for new members to help develop the server provided they have the time, will, and dedication. If you wish to apply for one of these positions, please reply using this application format:

Name:
Which Spot Are You Applying For?: (Tester/developer.)
Experience:
Proof of ability:
Do you have a Google Chat account?: (If you don’t, PM your email.)
Are you on Google+?:
Country: (If US/other large country with multiple time zones, specify which time zone you live in.)
Native Language: (If not English, how fluent are you in English?)
Extra info. (opt.):

All team members that join would be paid equally provided there was leftover donation money after a VPS is paid for a month.

[size=18pt]Development Log[/size]

[size=18pt]The Team[/size]
Kr3m1in - MoparScape username ‘MachTech’
Robert1122

[size=18pt]Features & Progress[/size]

Black = Completed.
Orange = Started, but not completed.
Red = Planned, but not started

[size=16pt]Base[/size]
PI/Project 06 Remake

[size=16pt]Combat[/size]
PvP complete
Perfect max hit formulas
Perfect accuracy formula
Equipment requirements

[size=16pt]Magic[/size]
All modern spells
Cannot cast through walls
Staves that give unlimited amount of runes

Bones to Peaches
Weakening spells

Teleports, teleothers

Enchanting jewelry

[size=16pt]Prayer[/size]

Every prayer working properly
Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

[size=16pt]Mining[/size]
Emptying and refilling rocks
All ores can be mined
Correct pickaxe finding and animations
Prospecting
Random chance of obtaining gems
Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms

[size=16pt]Firemaking[/size]
All logs lightable
Adding and depleting of lit logs
Ashes appear after logs burn out
Correct animations

[size=16pt]Woodcutting[/size]
Stumps and regrowing trees
Correct hatchet finding
Correct hatchet animations
Most trees cuttable except for regular tree
